description:
Prepare for the AWS SysOps Administrator Associate (SOA-C02) certification and pass! Certify your knowledge and skills in AWS technology, across a wide range of AWS services.

✏️ Course developed by Andrew Brown of ExamPro. @ExamProChannel 

🔗 Additional Exam Prep: https://www.exampro.co/soa-c02
